title: (x) Pitchfork 10th Anniversary New Year's Bash poster - Futura (customised) {Lex}
content:
Hey guys,

Any ideas on this one? It looks like a customised version of a normal sans but it might still have been commercialised.

| --- | --- |

author: xen

comments.content:
It could be Futura with various nodes removed.

- Lex
